mapper.insert: insert into basic_outSourcingBusinessPrice ( out_sourcing_id, business_id, lib_name, start_address, end_province, end_address, price, distance, car_type, insert_time, insert_user, update_time, update_user, del_flag) values ( #{outSourcingId}, #{businessId}, #{libName}, #{startAddress}, #{endProvince}, #{endAddress}, #{price}, #{distance}, #{carType}, #{insertTime}, #{insertUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update basic_outSourcingBusinessPrice
out_sourcing_id = #{outSourcingId},
business_id = #{businessId},
lib_name = #{libName},
start_address = #{startAddress},
end_province = #{endProvince},
end_address = #{endAddress},
price = #{price},
distance = #{distance},
car_type = #{carType},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
del_flag = #{delFlag}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from ( SELECT row_number() over(order by a.id asc) as rownumber,a.*,b.name as outSourcingName, s.name as supplierName,c.brand_name as brandName From basic_outSourcingBusinessPrice a left join basic_outSourcing b on b.id = a.out_sourcing_id left join basic_outSourcingBusiness c on c.id = a.business_id left join basic_supplier s on s.id = c.supplier_id
a.del_flag = 'N'
and a.out_sourcing_id = #{outSourcingId}
and a.business_id = #{businessId}
and ( a.lib_name LIKE concat('%', #{libName}, '%') )
and ( c.brand_name LIKE concat('%', #{brandName}, '%') )
and ( s.name LIKE concat('%', #{supplierName}, '%') )
and ( a.car_type LIKE concat('%', #{carType}, '%') )
and ( a.start_address LIKE concat('%', #{startAddress}, '%') )
and ( a.end_province LIKE concat('%', #{endProvince}, '%') )
and ( a.end_address LIKE concat('%', #{endAddress}, '%') )
) as t WHERE t.rownumber > #{pageStartIndex} And t.rownumber <= #{pageEndIndex} ORDER BY t.id asc

SELECT count(*) From basic_outSourcingBusinessPrice a left join basic_outSourcing b on b.id = a.out_sourcing_id left join basic_outSourcingBusiness c on c.id = a.business_id left join basic_supplier s on s.id = c.supplier_id
a.del_flag = 'N'
and a.out_sourcing_id = #{outSourcingId}
and a.business_id = #{businessId}
and ( a.lib_name LIKE concat('%', #{libName}, '%') )
and ( c.brand_name LIKE concat('%', #{brandName}, '%') )
and ( s.name LIKE concat('%', #{supplierName}, '%') )
and ( a.car_type LIKE concat('%', #{carType}, '%') )
and ( a.start_address LIKE concat('%', #{startAddress}, '%') )
and ( a.end_province LIKE concat('%', #{endProvince}, '%') )
and ( a.end_address LIKE concat('%', #{endAddress}, '%') )
